title: Pink collar ghettos
author: VD
content_html:
Dr. Helen foresees the fate of the universities:

It’s no wonder universities are turning into pink collar ghettos. Men are finding other avenues that are fulfilling and fit in with their lifestyle. With the rise of technology and alternative ways to make a living and live one’s lifestyle, I have no doubt that most men will find what works for them.

If you think the sex ratio is bad now, just wait until I get my next+1 technology gig rolling. Once it’s possible to take college courses on your Xbox 720 or PS/4 for anything you want anytime you want, no guy will ever bother with sitting in a lecture hall at 7 AM again.
